data.name: Cartel Tycoon - Artbook
data.detailed_description:
"Get to know the dazzling world of Cartel Tycoon from the inside out!

You’ll be able to see early concepts and evolution of the visual style of in-game assets, like buildings, cars and landscapes. And, of course, get a closer look at our characters and cinematics - with storyboards, visual development, and evolving snapshots.

More than 90 pages of:

  • - Early concepts
  • In-game assets creation, from 2D to finished 3D models
  • Characters / Buildings / Vehicles
  • Cinematics
  • Key art
  • Content that didn’t make it into the final game
  • And many more

You'll uncover the perspective of the team of artists at Moon Moose as they share their insights on designing the entire visual side of the game.

Contains exclusive materials which cannot be found anywhere else!"

To find the Artbook on your PC after downloading the DLC go to:
Steam Library -> Cartel Tycoon -> Manage... -> Browse local files

The Artbook will be located in the root game folder as a PDF!

data.short_description: More than 90 pages of Cartel Tycoon art, complete with developer commentaries!
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
